org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: def repoUrl = "http://gitlab:8060/ostapkob/${env.SERVICE_NAME}" git( url: repoUrl, branch: 'master', credentialsId: 'gitlab-token' )
sh 'docker version' def testImage = "${env.SERVICE_NAME}:test" env.TEST_IMAGE = testImage sh "docker buildx build -f Dockerfile.test -t ${testImage} ."
env | grep -E "(POSTGRES|MINIO)" > /tmp/envfile docker run --rm --env-file /tmp/envfile --add-host minio:$MINIO_IP --add-host postgres:$POSTGRES_IP --add-host kafka:$KAFKA_IP ${TEST_IMAGE}
def releaseImage = "${env.NEXUS_REGISTRY_URL}/${env.SERVICE_NAME}:${env.BUILD_NUMBER}" env.RELEASE_IMAGE = releaseImage sh "docker buildx build -f Dockerfile -t ${releaseImage} ."
